rules_text: Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. Destroy the rest. Those creatures' controllers arm them, then they fight each other. [i](Create colorless Equipment artifact tokens with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {2} attached to them.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Behind the guise of the Dust Devils and the Sidewinders, Cassidy and Jake's longtime feud finally came to a head. Few survived, leaving behind just scraps and memories of the frontier's most bitter and brutal rivalry.[/i]
